languages.text: "Слышишь, враг мой? Мы — только тени, только последователи. Тот, кто вложил в нас тайное знание, тебе еще встретится".
"Hear this, enemy mine! We are mere shadows. Followers. You are yet to meet Him who has endowed us with secret knowledge."
languages.original_text: "Слышишь, враг мой? Мы — только тени, только последователи. Тот, кто вложил в нас тайное знание, тебе еще встретится".

traits.locale_text: "Hear, O enemy mine! We are mere shadows. Mere followers. You are yet to meet Him who endowed us with secret knowledge."
"Hear, O enemy mine! We are mere shadows. Mere followers. You are yet to meet Him who endowed us with secret knowledge."
"Hear, o mine enemy! We are mere shadows. Followers. You are yet to meet Him, who has endowed us with secret knowledge."
"Hear, o mine enemy! We are mere shadows. Followers. You are yet to meet Him, who has endowed us with secret knowledge."
"Hear this, enemy mine! We are mere shadows. Followers. You are yet to meet Him who has endowed us with secret knowledge."
"Hear this, enemy mine! We are mere shadows. Followers. You are yet to meet Him who has endowed us with secret knowledge."

languages.text: "Höret, o mein Feind! Wir sind bloße Schatten. Anhänger. Ihr seid ihm noch nicht begegnet, der uns mit geheimem Wissen gesegnet hat."
languages.original_text: "Hear this, enemy mine! We are mere shadows. Followers. You are yet to meet Him who has endowed us with secret knowledge."

traits.locale_text: "Höret, o mein Feind! Wir sind bloße Schatten. Anhänger. Ihr seid ihm noch nicht begegnet, der uns mit geheimem Wissen gesegnet hat."

languages.text: « Écoutez, mon {mf|ennemi|ennemie} ! Nous ne sommes que des ombres. Des disciples. Vous devez encore rencontrer Celui qui nous a offert des connaissances secrètes. »
languages.original_text: "Hear this, enemy mine! We are mere shadows. Followers. You are yet to meet Him who has endowed us with secret knowledge."

traits.locale_text: « Écoutez, ô mon {mf|ennemi|ennemie} ! Nous ne sommes que des ombres. Des disciples. Vous devez encore rencontrer Celui qui nous a offert des connaissances secrètes. »

languages.text: “仔细听好，我的仇敌啊！我们不过是影子，是追随者。你还没有遇见他，那赐予我们秘密知识之人。
languages.original_text: "Hear this, enemy mine! We are mere shadows. Followers. You are yet to meet Him who has endowed us with secret knowledge."

traits.locale_text: “听着，我的仇敌啊！我们不过是影子，是追随者。你还没有遇见他，那赐予我们秘密知识之人。

languages.text: 「聞け、我が敵よ！私達は単なる影。従者なのだ。お前はまだ、我々に秘密の知識を与えてくださった、あのお方に会っていない」
languages.original_text: "Hear this, enemy mine! We are mere shadows. Followers. You are yet to meet Him who has endowed us with secret knowledge."

traits.locale_text: 「聞け、我が敵よ！私達は単なる影。従者なのだ。お前はまだ、我々に秘密の知識を与えてくださった、あのお方に会っていない」

languages.text: «¡Escucha mis palabras, oh, {mf||enemigo|enemiga} mí{mf|o|a}! Somos simples sombras. Seguidores. Aún no te has encontrado con Él, que nos ha dotado de un conocimiento secreto».
languages.original_text: "Hear this, enemy mine! We are mere shadows. Followers. You are yet to meet Him who has endowed us with secret knowledge."

traits.locale_text: «¡Escucha, oh, {mf||enemigo|enemiga}! Somos simples sombras. Seguidores. Aún no te has encontrado con Él, que nos ha dotado de un conocimiento secreto».

languages.text: "Şunu iyice anla düşmanım! Biz gölgeden ibaretiz. Birer müridiz. Bize saklı irfanı bahşedenle er geç tanışacaksın."
languages.original_text: "Hear this, enemy mine! We are mere shadows. Followers. You are yet to meet Him who has endowed us with secret knowledge."

traits.locale_text: "Şunu iyice anla yegâne düşmanım! Biz gölgeden ibaretiz. Birer müridiz. Bize mahrem irfanı bahşedenle henüz tanışmadın."
